column5: Shared condominium, 5 min to Hwy 59, 8 min to I610, 8 min to Beltway 8, 10 min to Galleria, 20 min to medical center, downtown. Small complex. 2 swimming pools, washer/dryer. I offer some breakfast items - hot and cold cereal, fruit, juices, coffee and tea. I do not add a cleaning fee. There is a park next door, with walking, tennis, activity center. Shopping nearby.
